data.caption: Listing of Equity Shares of Kalpataru Ltd
data.news_body: Trading Members of the Exchange are hereby informed that effective from July 01 2025 the equity shares of Kalpataru Ltd  (Scrip Code: 544423) are listed and admitted to dealings on the Exchange in the list of B Group Securities.
